Name: Moral King
About the game: Moral King is an interactive movie, which means you can control the protagonist during the movie. Whenever the mouse pointer is visible, you are asked. You have to decide, solve puzzles and react quickly in some places. Story: When the loved one of our nameless hero is surprisingly abducted, a clue leading him to a castle ruin. There he dives into the medieval environment of the castle Altendorf and tries to liberate his lover by solving puzzles and overcoming guards. Whether he manages to get arrested, or rather leaves the castle with a chest full of treasures, the viewer decides in an interactive film experience with the style of a video role-playing game ...
